reporting-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

title.narrative: Support to Women Refugees from Syria and Vulnerable Women and Girls in Host Communities in Egypt, Jordan and Lebanon

description.narrative: Il progetto è finalizzato alla promozione della partecipazione delle donne siriane al processo di pace e alla fase di ricostruzione della Siria nel quadro dell’agenda internazionale Women, Peace and Security.
The project aims at promoting the participation of Syrian women in the peace process and the rebuilding phase of Syria within the framework of the International Women, Peace and Security agenda.

organisation.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

sector.narrative: Civilian peace-building, conflict prevention and resolution

tag.narrative: Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls
Ensure responsive, inclusive, participatory and representative decision-making at all levels
Ensure women’s full and effective participation and equal opportunities for leadership at all levels of decision-making in political, economic and public life
Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels
